description: The greens were fun, but now you want more. The Panterra 90 GW balances comfort and performance for a fun all-mountain experience. With medium flex, these solid boots give you the confidence to take your technique up a notch and hit harder runs. Their 3-piece shell construction is customizable, so you can make these boots truly your own. The sculpted liners can be skied out of the box, or thermo-moulded to add some instant magic to your fit. This much comfort means one thing – you ski better all day.Lightweight PU shell construction reduces weight.Cabrio 3 piece shell design flexes consistently and absorbs shock.Variable Volume Fit allows adjustment of the forefoot width.Contour 4 Fit Technology fits securely while allowing extra room where needed.My Fit system offers customizable fit at the shell and liner.Adjustable rear cuff lets you customize the boot's height to your calf.Dynalink heel strap keeps the foot from sliding.Grip Walk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Dura-grip replaceable heels and toes.
name: Dalbello Panterra 90 GW Ski Boots
